page.title: 04SERVICES IN THE NEWTOWN AREA
page.content: Police: The local policeman is based at Hambledon, the nearest police station is at Fareham. Fire: Droxford Fire Station is manned by part-time staff and covers most of this area. Health/Welfare: There is a Health Centre at Denmead with ancillary service at Hambledon. Wickham has a General Practioners Group Practice. The nearest hospital is the Queen Alexandra at Cosham. A mobile foot clinic visits the village monthly. Voluntary services provide hot midday meals to the elderly and will convey them to medical/hospital appointments. The Red Cross loan medical aids. Water and electricity are supplied to this area but there is no gas or mains drainage. Septic tanks or cesspits have to be emptied at the owners/ occupiers expense.
